snippet: Raphael Ward, 16, a high-achieving student who had a strong commitment to playing sports, was shot about a block from his mother's apartment in the Baruch housing project on Friday night.
abstract: Raphael Ward, 16, a high-achieving student who had a strong commitment to playing sports, was shot about a block from his mother's apartment in the Baruch housing project on Friday night.

byline.original: By COLIN MOYNIHAN and DANIEL KRIEGER

headline.main: On a Lower East Side Corner, Mourning a Young Athlete Killed by a Gunman
headline.print_headline: Teenager Fatally Shot In New York
